node.title: An activist, a director and an MMA fighter: Harry Potter stars have come a long way from Hogwarts, 20 years on
node.alt: The three stars of the Harry Potter films in 2000. Emma Watson (left), Daniel Radcliffe (Centre), and Rupert Grint (Right).
node.description: It's been 20 years since the release of Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, which inspired a new generation of Potterheads and skyrocketed the young cast to superstardom. Here's what they've been up to since.Â
node.content:
["Twenty years on from the release Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone,\u00a0the first film in the blockbuster eight-part series, households across the country used lockdown as an opportunity to revisit the cast of familiar faces and dive back into the world of\u00a0witchcraft and wizardry.", "Despite premiering in 2001, the first film of the franchise still ranks as one of the top 50 blockbuster movies of all time, raking in more than $1.9 billion worldwide.", "It also sparked a global movement of superfans, called Potterheads, and skyrocketed the cast of child actors to superstardom.", "This week it was announced many of the film's stars will be reuniting for a special 20th anniversary retrospective\u00a0to be broadcast on January 1.", "The reunion, Harry Potter 20th Anniversary: Return to Hogwarts, will see the three main stars \u2014\u00a0Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson and Rupert Grint \u2014 and a handful of supporting actors return to the original sets from the first film.\u00a0", "While we wait for the much-anticipated reunion, here's a look at what the students of Hogwarts have got up to since the end of the series.", "
Daniel Radcliffe \u2014 Harry Potter
", "Daniel Radcliffe was just 11 years old when he starred as The Boy Who Lived \u2014 a role that led to him becoming one of the highest-paid actors in the world. But since wrapping the series at 21 years old, he's worked hard to distinguish himself\u00a0in roles worlds away from his breakout character.", "", "
Daniel Radcliffe played the titular character in the series, making him one of the most well-known young actors in the world.\u00a0(AFP:\u00a0Noam Galai/Warner Brothers)
", "His first post-Potter role was in the 2012 horror flick The Woman in Black, before going on to portray poet Allen Ginsberg in Kill Your Darlings the following year.", "He's also made his mark on Broadway, most notably in Equus where he starred alongside his uncle from the Harry Potter series. The controversial role required Radcliffe \u2014 who was still a teenager \u2014 to appear naked, marking his transition from child star to adult actor.", "The now 32-year-old has also been involved with a slew of smaller productions, including What If (2013), Trainwreck (2015), and Guns Akimbo (2019).", "
Rupert Grint \u2014 Ron Weasley
", "Unlike his co-stars, Rupert Grint took a short break from acting after playing Harry's loveable best friend in all eight movies.", "", "
Rupert Grint had a short stint as a hotel owner between acting roles.\u00a0(AFP:\u00a0Michael loccisano/Warner Brothers)
", "In 2012, he returned to the big screen in Into the White \u2014 a WWII action film about British and German soldiers who found themselves stranded in the wilderness after an aircraft battle. He's also appeared in a handful of television shows, including Sick Note (2017-18), Snatch (2017-18), The ABC Murders (2018), and Servant (2019-21).", "Shortly after his stint as Ron, Grint purchased a hotel in the British town of Hertford, but it failed to make money and closed after four years.\u00a0", "The now 33-year-old told The Guardian in 2018 he was \"really enjoying stepping further away from that blue-screen world\", while describing the challenges of his early rise to stardom.", "\"I'm just going to go with the flow, keep playing interesting characters and see what happens,\" he said.", "
Emma Watson \u2014 Hermione Granger
", "From child star to women's rights activist, it's easy to draw similarities between Emma Watson and the brainy and outspoken Hermione.", "", "
While continuing with acting, Emma Watson has become a prominent advocate for women's rights.\u00a0(AFP: Justin Tallis/Warner Brothers)
", "After finishing the Harry Potter films, Watson split her time between acting and academia, completing her bachelor's degree in English literature at the prestigious Brown University in 2014.", "Since then, she's become a prominent advocate for women's rights; she became a UN Women Goodwill Ambassador in 2014\u00a0and later led the United Kingdom's TimesUp campaign. Her work for gender equality saw her named as one of Time Magazine's 100 most influential people in 2015.", "But despite her long list of activist accolades, Watson has still found time to act in a number of blockbuster roles, including as Belle in the 2017 adaptation of Beauty and the Beast and most recently as Meg in Little women.", "In a move that would make Hermione herself proud, Watson also founded a feminist bookclub on Goodreads, encouraging thousands of women across the world to participate in discussions about gender equality.", "
Tom Felton \u2014\u00a0Draco Malfoy
", "Like his Gryffindor peers, Tom Felton has continued with acting, appearing in the Rise of the Planet of the Apes in 2011 and period-drama Belle in 2013. More recently he played Tony Turner in Dutch war film The Forgotten Battle (2020).", "", "
After playing one of the villains of the Harry Potter universe, Tom Felton moved into making music.\u00a0(AFP:\u00a0J\u00f6rg Carstensen/Warner Brothers)
", "Outside of acting he's a keen musician and has carved out a niche as a singer-songwriter.", "Much like the rest of us, Felton has been rewatching the Harry Potter films this year, sharing his reaction with fans on Instagram live.", "
Bonnie Wright \u2014 Ginny Weasley
", "Bonnie Wright found fame as the only female child of the Weasley family, and Harry\u2019s ultimate love interest.\u00a0", "Following the films she continued acting, landing a number of smaller roles and her stage debut in a production of The Moment of Truth.", "", "
Bonnie Wright has moved behind the camera since finding fame as Ginny Weasley.(AFP/Warner Brothers)
", "But after graduating from the University of Arts London with a degree in writing and directing she moved behind the camera. She's since directed a number of short films and commercials.\u00a0", "The 30-year-old is also a passionate environmental advocate. In 2017, she boarded\u00a0a Greenpeace ship to raise awareness about the impact of microplastics in the ocean.", "As of this year, she's\u00a0working on an environmental feature film and a book about at-home climate change solutions.", "
Matthew Lewis \u2014 Neville Longbottom
", "Like many of his co-stars, Matthew Lewis continued with acting after playing the bumbling and unlucky Neville Longbottom. But it was the British actor's \"glow up\" that landed him a new legion of fans.", "", "
Matthew Lewis hit headlines for his post-Potter \"glow up\".\u00a0(AFP: Leon Neal/Warner Brothers)
", "In 2015, he appeared shirtless on the cover Attitude magazine under the headline \"From Hogwarts to Hottie\u201d, prompting Harry Potter's creator JK Rowling to tweet: \"Warn me next time, for God's sake.\"", "On screen, he's appeared in a number of television series, including Happy Valley (2016), Girlfriends (2018), and all Creatures Great and Small (2020-21).", "Recently, you may have also spotted him in Baby Done (2020) \u2014 a New Zealand film by comedian Rose Matafeo which charts the trials of a young couple as they embark on parenthood.", "
Evanna Lynch \u2014 Luna Lovegood
", "The eccentric Luna Lovegood only joined the franchise in the fifth film, but her character has endured as one of the most-loved of the series.", "It's the story of how Irish actor Evanna Lynch came to appear in the series, however,\u00a0that has become the stuff of legend among fans.", "", "
A passionate activist for animal rights, Evanna Lynch has launched a vegan and cruelty-free beauty subscription box.\u00a0(AFP: David Livingston/Warner Brothers)
", "From the age of 11, Lynch struggled with eating disorders and turned to the Harry Potter books as respite. She's previously said the books were the only thing that could distract her from the illness", "It was in this period that she sent a letter to the book's author to thank her. Rowling responded, and the pair became penpals before she was ever considered for the role.", "Recently she told Seven's The Morning Show of the moment she got the call about her audition:\u00a0", "\"You kind of can't process something that big, so I just took it a step at a time, I went home and I actually did my homework.\"", "Post-Potter, she's acted in a number of indie films and stage productions, while lending her distinctive voice to audiobooks, cartoons, and podcasts. She's also founded a vegan and cruelty-free beauty subscription box.", "Last month, Lynch released a memoir about growing up in the spotlight and her battles with eating disorders, titled The Opposite of Butterfly Hunting.", "
Alfred Enoch \u2014 Dean Thomas
", "Alfred Enoch has spent his years since Harry Potter racking up a number of successful acting roles and graduating from Oxford University.", "", "
Alfred Enoch continued to act after his role in Harry Potter, appearing in the television series How to Get Away With Murder.\u00a0(AFP:\u00a0Paul Archuleta/Warner Brothers)
", "Most notably, he appeared in The Picture of Dorian Grey adaptation in 2021 and in the television series How to Get Away with Murder between 2014 and 2020.", "Speaking to The Guardian this year, Enoch reflected on playing one of the few non-white characters in the Harry Potter world.", "\"I wasn't an integral character. I've expressed that to people and they still say, 'Yeah, but I saw you and you looked like me,\" he said.", "
Katie Leung \u2014 Cho Chang
", "Leung played Harry's first love interest \u2014 and his first kiss \u2014 and one of the few Asian Hogwarts students in the movies. The much-anticipated smooch earned her and Radcliffe a nomination for MTV's Best Kiss award in 2008.", "", "
Katie Leung played Jackie Chan's daughter in The Foreigner.\u00a0(Instagram: Katie Leung/Warner Brothers)
", "Since appearing in\u00a0four of the Harry Potter movies, the Scottish-Chinese actor has gone on to complete degrees in painting, design, and photography while pursuing acting in theatre,\u00a0films and on television.", "In 2017 she appeared next to Jackie Chan and Pierce Brosnan in The Foreigner, playing Chan's daughter.", "Earlier this year she opened up about her teenage\u00a0rise to fame, telling the Chinese Chippy Girl podcast she was subject to racist abuse online after appearing in the series.", "
Jamie Waylett \u2014 Vincent Crabbe
", "Jamie Waylett's acting career was short-lived \u2014 his only role being Draco Malfoy's Slytherin sidekick in the first six movies.", "", "
Jamie Waylett's acting career was cut short due to brushes with the law.(AFP: Shaun Curry/Warner Brothers)
", "According to the BBC, the former child actor was sentenced to two years jail for his participation in the 2012 London Riots. He was 22 years old at the time.", "
Josh Herdman \u2014 Gregory Goyle
", "After his role as the third member of the Slytherin trio, Josh Herdman went\u00a0on to act in a few roles, including the 2018 release of Robinhood.", "", "
Josh Herdman describes himself as a family man and martial artist.\u00a0(Instagram: Josh Herdman/Warner Brothers)
", "He describes himself in his Instagram bio as a \"family man\" and \"martial artist\". In 2016, the BBC reported the actor had begun his career as an amateur cage fighter \u2014 but that doesn't mean he's given up on acting.\u00a0", "\"I haven't fallen out of love with it, I still have an agent and still go for auditions,\" he said, according to the BBC. \"It's just a little bit like playing the lottery for a living.\""]
